hymn.title: That I might be a minister

layout.singingstanza: That I might be a min -- is -- ter, a min -- is -- ter of Christ Je -- sus to the Gen -- tiles, a la -- bor -- ing priest of the gos -- pel of God, a la -- bor -- ing priest of the gos -- pel of God, in or -- der that the of -- fer -- ing, the of -- fering of the Gen -- tiles might be ac -- cept -- a -- ble, hav -- ing been sanc -- ti -- fied in the Ho -- ly Spir -- it, sanc -- ti -- fied in the Ho -- ly Spir -- it.

lyrics.stanza: That I might be a minister, A minister of Christ Jesus to the Gentiles, A laboring priest of the gospel of God, A laboring priest of the gospel of God, In order that the offering, The offering of the Gentiles might be acceptable, Having been sanctified in the Holy Spirit, Sanctified in the Holy Spirit.
